reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 46/02: DEADLINE FOR BY-LAW ADOPTING OPTIONAL NEW MULTI-RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY CLASS FOR 2002 TAXATION YEAR
reg_info.reg_name_text: DEADLINE FOR BY-LAW ADOPTING OPTIONAL NEW MULTI-RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY CLASS FOR 2002 TAXATION YEAR
reg_info.act_under: Assessment Act   Loi sur l’évaluation foncière

content.content: 1. For the 2002 taxation year, April 30, 2002 is prescribed as the later deadline under clause 2 (3.2) (e) of the Act with respect to the new multi-residential property class. O. Reg. 46/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the 2002 taxation year, April 30, 2002 is prescribed as the later deadline under clause 2 (3.2) (e) of the Act with respect to the new multi-residential property class. O. Reg. 46/02, s. 1.
